title: List of Clemson Tigers head football coaches
summary: The Clemson Tigers football program is a college football team that represents Clemson University in the Atlantic Division of the Atlantic Coast Conference (ACC). The Tigers compete as part of the National Collegiate Athletic Association (NCAA) Division I Football Bowl Subdivision. The team has had 25Â head coaches since it began play in the 1896 season.[1] Since October 2008, Dabo Swinney has served as Clemson's head coach.[2]
